gallf.body: // ACF Image Gallery $images = get_field( '${1:field_name}' ); if ( $images ) : ?> <${2:ul}> <${3:li}>

gallof.body: // ACF Image Gallery $images = get_field( '${1:field_name}', 'options' ); if ( $images ) : ?> <${2:ul}> <${3:li}>

gallsf.body: // ACF Image Gallery $images = get_sub_field( '${1:field_name}' ); if ( $images ) : ?> <${2:ul}> <${3:li}>

relf.body: // ACF Relationship Field $posts = get_field( '${1:field_name}' ); if ( $posts ) : ?> <${2:ul}> <${3:li}>

relfo.body: // ACF Relationship Field $posts = get_field( '${1:field_name}', 'options' ); if ( $posts ) : ?> <${2:ul}> <${3:li}>

relsf.body: // ACF Relationship Field $posts = get_sub_field( '${1:field_name}' ); if ( $posts ) : ?> <${2:ul}> <${3:li}>

rf.body:
if ( have_rows( '${1:field_name}' ) ) : ?>
	<${2:ul}>
		<?php while ( have_rows( '${1:field_name}' ) ) : the_row(); ?>
			<${3:li}><?php the_sub_field( '${4:sub_field_name}' ); ?></${3:li}>
		<?php endwhile; ?>
	</${2:ul}>
<?php endif;

rfo.body:
if ( have_rows( '${1:field_name}', 'options' ) ) : ?>
	<${2:ul}>
		<?php while ( have_rows( '${1:field_name}', 'options' ) ) : the_row(); ?>
			<${3:li}><?php the_sub_field( '${4:sub_field_name}' ); ?></${3:li}>
		<?php endwhile; ?>
	</${2:ul}>
<?php endif;
